frontmatter.title: Troubleshooing
frontmatter.meta_title: MStore Magento the complete mobile commerce app by React native
frontmatter.meta_description: You are shop-owners of physical stores with high-traffic consumers and think to go digital. Or you are online shop-owners with E-Commerce websites. Both of you want to maximize sale opportunities

markdownRemark.html:
Basic question during installing the app that you could meet and also provide some solution to fix the installing issues. If these answer could not be, raise net thread on our discuss community: https://github.com/inspireui/support/issues

My Android simulator not run with Expo ?

First make you you can open the Android simulator successful by using Genymotion

https://docs.expo.io/versions/latest/workflow/genymotion

Could not connect to development server

First, make sure your have run "yarn install" or "npm install" to create the node_modules folder

Then, try the press the Restart button from Expo and Ctrl+R (Window) or Command+R (MacOS) to reload the project on simulator. We will able to see the Building Javascript bundle..xxx% at bottom of the simulator.
